sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Form, Col, InputGroup, Button, OverlayTrigger, Tooltip, Table } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../index.css' class BondPricingOne extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { currentBond: [], month: this.getCurrentMonth(), year: this.getCurrentYear(), showTooltip: { visibility: 'visible' } }; this.onUpdateEnter = this.onUpdateEnter.bind(this) } getCurrentMonth() { let d = new Date(); return d.getMonth() + 1 } getCurrentYear() { let d = new Date(); return d.getFullYear() } onUpdateEnter(e) { e.preventDefault(); setTimeout(() => { this.setState({ showTooltip: { visibility: 'hidden' } }) }, 3500) } onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); const series_map = { 'EE Bond': 'EE', 'E Bond': 'E', 'I Bond': 'I', 'Savings Bond': 'S' } let bond = { 'vMonth': e.target.aMonth.value, 'vYear': e.target.aYear.value, 'series': series_map[e.target.series.value], 'denomination': (e.target.denomination.value).substring(1), 'serialNumber': e.target.serialnumber.value, 'iMonth': e.target.iMonth.value, 'iYear': e.target.iYear.value } const requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*' }, body: JSON.stringify({ bond }) }; fetch('http://localhost:5000/individual/bonds', requestOptions) .then(response => response.json()) .then(() => { let bondData = [response['vDate'], response['series'], response['denomination'], response['serialNumber'], response['iDate'], response['iPrice'], response['value'], response['interest']] this.setState({ currentBond: bondData }) }) } render() { return (
VALUE AS OF / Revalue all bonds by this date. }> SERIES DENOMINATION SERIAL NUMBER ISSUE DATE /
{this.state.currentBond.length > 0 ?
Lookup Date Series Denomination Serial Number Issue Date Issue Price Interest Value
: 'test'}
) } } export default BondPricingOne;
